tami

The Lightweight API Client

Launch from your terminal, run in your browser. Test your APIs without the bloat of traditional tools.

Get Started

npx tami-client
View on GitHub
Features

Why Choose tami-client?

A better way to test and interact with your APIs.

Terminal First

Launch directly from your command line with a simple command.

Browser Based

Familiar browser interface with all the tools you need for API testing.

How It Works

Simple, fast, and efficient API testing in three easy steps.

1

Run in Terminal

Type npx tami-client in your terminal.

2

Browser Opens

A new browser tab automatically opens with the tami interface.

3

Test Your APIs

Start making requests and testing your APIs with a lightweight, fast interface.

tami
GET
https://api.example.com/users
Response
                      
                        
{
  "users": [
    { "id": 1, "name": "John Doe" },
    { "id": 2, "name": "Jane Smith" }
  ]
}
  • No installation required - runs with npx
  • Uses your browser's engine instead of a separate Electron app
  • Test local APIs directly from your browser
  • API history stored locally

Ready to try a better API client?

Start using tami today and see how much faster and lighter API testing can be.

npx tami-client
